sql_queries.sql_query: SELECT CONCAT(FLOOR(average_income / 10000) * 10000, '-', FLOOR(average_income / 10000) * 10000 + 9999) AS bin, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY FLOOR(average_income / 10000) ORDER BY FLOOR(average_income / 10000);
SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(average_income) AS x_value, AVG(median_income) AS y_value FROM income_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2023' GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY borough_name;

SELECT CONCAT(FLOOR(average_income / 10000) * 10000, '-', FLOOR(average_income / 10000) * 10000 + 9999) AS bin, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM income_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') = '2023' GROUP BY bin ORDER BY bin;
SELECT date AS time, median_income AS value FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY date, median_income ORDER BY date;

SELECT 'Mean Income' AS category, AVG(average_income) AS value FROM income_data WHERE date LIKE '2023%' UNION ALL SELECT 'Median Income' AS category, AVG(median_income) AS value FROM income_data WHERE date LIKE '2023%';
